name: "And the Weiner is..." Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is not skating on the frozen pond in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Brian.

	Although Brian showed off his figure skating skills in New York in "A Picture is Worth a Thousand Bucks", he decides to have a snowball fight with Stewie.

questions.text: When Meg signs up to be a flag girl, what is not something wrong with the other girls?
questions.explanation:
One has a glass eye.

	Unfortunately, since Meg is unpopular and not pretty, she has to sign up for the flag girls squad.  The flag girls are a step down from the cheerleading squad.

questions.text: What score does the opposing team have at the football game where Meg is head flag girl?
questions.explanation:
Fourteen.

	When Meg finally got to walk onto the field, she was bombarded with rancid meat.  The whole audience laughed at her and she was humiliated.

questions.text: What game do Peter and Chris play at the YMCA?
questions.explanation:
Basketball.

	Peter fools Chris during the game and narrowly wins.  After the game, they go into the sauna where Peter discovers something about Chris.

questions.text: What song does Stewie sing for one and a half minutes during the episode?
questions.explanation:
Rocketman & Rocket Man.

	Stewie states that he can teach Meg how to be cool, so the scene changes to Stewie singing Rocketman.  Stewie says that that's "the good stuff".

questions.text: Who is the high school's biology teacher?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Burler

	Mr. Burler gave Meg the test answers after she helped him fend vampires away from his bedroom with a wooden stake, a cross and garlic.

questions.text: Who does Peter buy a new car from?
questions.explanation:
Jim.

	Jim owns an exotic car dealership, and Peter buys the car to look impressive, but he ends up crashing it into the grille of a transport truck, and it gets smashed.

questions.text: What club does Peter become a member of during this episode?
questions.explanation:
National Gun Association.

	The club states that a man is only as big as the gun he uses, so Peter signs up and buys a shotgun.  Lois is opposed to the idea.

questions.text: How old is Connie DeMico at her birthday party?
questions.explanation:
Sixteen.

	Meg is invited to the party only to be humiliated again.  She finally realizes that Lois was right about the whole situation.

questions.text: What does Meg end up kissing at Connie's birthday party?
questions.explanation:
A pig.

	Meg runs out of the house, and Lois tells her that she sent an old friend into the house to scar Connie for life.  The friend turns out to be Quagmire.
